name: Actor
desc: Kevin Hart exploded onto the scene as one of the most versatile comedic actors in both television and film; and he’s making history.

name: Comedian
desc: Kevin has smashed records as the highest-grossing touring comedian in history. Catch him now on is current ‘What Now?’ Tour.

name: Entrepreneur
desc: Hart has taken matters into his own hands with the launch of his full-service production house, HartBeat Productions.

name: Father
desc: With so many hats, Kevin’s most treasured role is that of loving and devoted Dad to children, Heaven & Hendrix Hart.
